title: Story
body:
In the land of monsters, every monster is unique..
<<n>>
Some have blue eyes, some have red. 
The red eyed one? His name is Ted.
<<n>> 
Some have 3 eyes. Sometimes more,
peeking from your closet door.
<<n>>
A monster has a name, a face,
a favorite toy, a favorite place.
<<n>>
Monsters are like me and you,
Sometimes nice, but sometimes cruel.
<<n>>
Don't be scared and do not worry
Monsters find YOU very scary.
<<n>>
Alright.. 
Time to go to bed. Here's your teddy.
<<n>>
[[Night Night|Story1]]
[[I'm scared..|Story2]]

title: StoryInterlude1
body:
Have you heard the one about ((name))?
<<n>>
((name)) has ((armType)) arms and ((eyeColor)) eyes.
<<n>>
One day, <<name>> was playing in the woods.
((name)) had a fun time jumping in the leaves.
<<n>>
The leaves, however, did not like being jumped in,
and they formed into a pile over a big hole.
<<n>>
((name)), not seeing the hole, jumped right into that big pile of leaves.
<<n>>
And so ((name)) fell and fell and fell.. never to be seen again.

title: StoryInterlude2
body:
Let me tell you about the monster named ((name)).
<<n>> 
((name)) has ((numEyes)) eyes, and fur colored ((furColor)).
<<n>>
((name)) was playing with his ((favoriteToy)),
when he dropped it in a well.
<<n>>
The ((favoriteToy)) fell a long long way,
until - splash! - it landed in the water.
<<n>>
((name)) lowered a bucket into the well to get it,
but what he pulled back up surprised them.
<<n>>
The bucket was filled with...
<<n>>
Spaghetti!

title: BanterPlayful1
body:
Hey, what's your favorite game?
[[Monopoly|BanterPlayful1-1]]
[[Mario|BanterPlayful1-1]]
[[Soccer|BanterPlayful1-2]]
[[Basketball|BanterPlayful1-2]]

title: BanterPlayful1-1
body:
Oh! You like to play inside!
<<n>>
I usually play with my toys inside the closet..
I would love to come out and play with you sometime.
{{i}}

title: BanterPlayful1-2
body:
Oh.. so you like to play outside.
<<n>>
I usually just play here inside the closet..
I'd love to play outside with you sometime.
{{i}}

title: NightIntro
body:
A monster has visited in the night.
{{banter}}

title: BanterPlayful2
body:
Have you ever tried to hula hoop?
[[Yes|BanterPlayful2-1]]
[[No|BanterPlayful2-2]]

title: BanterPlayful2-1
BanterPlayful2-2
body:
No? Well, I wouldn't recommend it.
<<n>>
I tried to hula Hoop once, but Hoop got really mad,
and ended up hula-ing me instead.
{{i}}

title: BanterPlayful3
body:
Hey, do you lose a lot of toys?
[[Yes|BanterPlayful3-1]]
[[No|BanterPlayful3-2]]

title: BanterPlayful3-1
body:
Good! Lost toys means more toys for me!
{{i}}

title: BanterPlayful3-2
BanterPlayful4
body:
I just played the BEST BOARDGAME!
<<n>>
You had these spinning gear things,
and you put your little guys on them.
<<n>>
Then, the little guys come off the gear,
and you get... CORN!
<<n>>
Pretty cool, right?
[[Yes|BanterPlayful4-1]]
[[No|BanterPlayful4-2]]

title: BanterPlayful4-1
body:
Yeah!! And then once you have enough corn,
you can make a sacrifice to the gods!
<<n>>
That's how you get all the points.
{{i}}

title: BanterPlayful4-2
body:
No? Maybe you're more into roll and move games.
Like Monopoly.
<<n>>
I used to play Monopoly, until Greg ate all of the money.
{{i}}

title: BanterForgetful1
body:
Oh hi! Have we met before?
I don't remember..
[[Yes|BanterForgetful1-1]]
[[No|BanterForgetful1-2]]

title: BanterForgetful1-1
body:
We have? That can't be right..
<<n>>
I've never met a human before.
Or have I?
<<n>>
You humans are pretty forgettable,
so maybe you're right.
{{i}}

title: BanterForgetful1-2
body:
Hm.. No I'm pretty sure we've met.
You just don't remember me is all.
<<n>>
You humans are pretty forgetful sometimes.
{{i}}

title: BanterCheerful1
body:
Hey hello!
<<n>>
Hi there!
<<n>>
What a nice closet, and room!
<<n>>
This is so cool, I'm totally in your bedroom right now.
{{i}}

title: BanterCheerful2
body:
Hum dee dee
Hum dee doo
<<n>>
I love to hum and sing!
Oh.. I'm not keeping you awake am I?
[[Yes|BanterCheerful2-1]]
[[No|BanterCheerful2-2]]

title: BanterCheerful2-1
body:
Oh.. 
<<n>>
That's great! Night time is the worst time to sleep!
Will you hum with me?
[[Yes|BanterCheerful2-3]]
[[No|BanterCheerful2-3]]

title: BanterCheerful2-2
body:
Oh good.
Why would someone want to sleep at night anyways?
<<n>>
Will you hum sing with me?
[[Yes|BanterCheerful2-3]]
[[No|BanterCheerful2-3]]

title: BanterCheerful2-3
body:
*The monster is ignoring you.*
<<n>>
Hum dee hee..
Hum dee ho.. 
{{i}}

title: BanterGoofy1
body:
Hey, what has one head, one foot and four legs?
<<n>>
A bed! 
Also Merle.. I really can't tell you what his other 3 legs are for.
{{i}}

title: BanterGoofy2
body:
Hey, what did the janitor say when he jumped out of the closet?
<<n>>
... SUPPLIES!
<<n>>
I wonder what I would say if I jumped out of YOUR closet?
{{i}}

title: BanterStupid1
body:
Do you ever wonder why all these closets are so small?
[[Yes|BanterStupid1-1]]
[[No|BanterStupid1-2]]

title: BanterStupid1-1
body:
You're a big dummy, then.
<<n>>
Obviously they are so small so that
the humans don't try to sleep in here.
<<n>>
You're not going to sleep in here are you?
[[Yes|BanterStupid1-3]]
[[No|BanterStupid1-4]]

title: BanterStupid1-2
body:
Oh. You must be smart like me, then.
<<n>>
Hey Mr. Smart pants,
Why are you sleeping on a bed?
<<n>>
Don't answer that..
I already know why.
<<n>>
It's because Borf is already sleeping underneath it.
{{i}}

title: BanterStupid1-3
body:
What a dummy thing to do.
<<n>>
Only a real dummy would want to stay in a closet all night.
{{i}}

title: BanterStupid1-4
body:
I know you really meant yes.
<<n>>
Look at you, eyeing up this cloest like you owned it.
<<n>>
Well, I'm already sleeping here,
so you'll have to find somewhere else!
{{i}}

title: TitleScreen
NightTimeTransition
Equip
StoryTime
BanterStupid2
body:
*The monster is talking to itself..*
<<n>>
So.. if one sock goes on one foot,
and humans have two feet..
<<n>>
But sometimes only one sock..
<<n>>
Then humans would have to put one sock on two feet!

title: Story1
body: Empty Text

title: Story2
body: Empty Text

title: PreStory
1st Night
NightTime
1st Night-1
body:
Me neither. Monsters don't usually sleep at night.
<<n>>
It looks like your closet leads right into the land of monsters.
Did you know that?
[[Yes|1st Night-1-2]]
[[No|1st Night-1-1]]

title: 1st Night-2
body:
Are you sure you're sleeping??
I was going to tell you about monsters.
[[I'm not sleeping.|1st Night-1]]
[[... (skip tutorial)|1st Night-2-2]]

title: 1st Night-1-1
body:
Oh! That means I'm the first monster you've ever met!
<<n>>
Lucky you, I'm what they call a "friendly" monster.
<<n>>
Don't worry. I won't eat you.
.. Unless I do.
<<n>>
But I probably won't,
if you can find my weakness.
<<n>>
Maybe if you can find out my name,
then we'll be friends?
<<n>>
I don't want to eat my friends.
<<n>>
Or, if i'm particularly hungry, maybe if you bring me my favorite snack, I won't eat you.
<<n>>
I suppose some of these other monsters might not eat you either, if you find out their secrets.
<<n>>
The only way to do that, I suppose, is to ask their friends about them.
<<n>>
Just remember, little one:
Every monster is different..
<<n>>
And different kinds of "nice", too.
<<n>>
{{goToNode:StoryTimeTransition}}

title: StoryTimeTransition
1st Night-2-1
body:
Thought so..
<<n>>
Here's your crash course in Monster-ology.
<<n>>
Monsters are usually really hungry.
Sometimes they just get bored.
<<n>>
If a monster is hungry enough, or bored enough, then..
<<n>>
They'll probably eat you!
<<n>>
But, monsters never eat their friends,
if they are friendly.
<<n>>
And sometimes a good old human snack will do,
if they are hungry enough..
<<n>>
Whoever the monster, you'll need to find their weakness,
and to do that, you'll probably need to ask questions.
<<n>>
I'm sure you'll meet lots of new monsters soon,
and you can ask them all sorts of questions!
<<n>>
Anyways, I'll let you sleep..
Maybe if you see me again we can be friends!
{{goToNode:StoryTimeTransition}}

title: 1st Night-1-2
body:
Really? Well then you should know all about us monsters.
<<n>>
I guess I don't need to tell YOU how to not be eaten. Right?
[[Right (hard mode)|1st Night-1-2-1]]
[[Remind me!|1st Night-2-1]]

title: 1st Night-2-2
body:
Hmm..
<<n>>
Well, nighty night, little one.
<<n>>
{{goToNode:StoryTimeTransition}}

title: 1st Night-1-2-1
